content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position (60.5, -61.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (60.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (61.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position (62.5, -60.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (62.5, -60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (62.5, -61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (107.5, -33.5) with a working status and connected pipes.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL, connected to pipes.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5) with a not connected status and connected pipes.

### Pipe Group 1 at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of a group of pipes with fluid system 142794, including pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Pipe Group 2 at position (111.5, -33.5)
Consists of a group of pipes with fluid system 142796, including pipes at positions (111.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), and others.

### Electricity Group at position (119.5, -30.5)
Consists of an electricity group with id 576328 and a pole at position (119.5, -30.5).

### Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of a belt at position (63.5, -53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when connecting pipes: Ensure that the entities are close enough to each other and that there are no obstacles in the way.
* Errors when placing entities: Make sure to check if the tile is occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
* Errors when using inserters: Ensure that the inserter has enough fuel and that the destination is not blocked.
* Errors when using boilers: Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel and that the steam output point is connected to a steam engine.

# NAMESPACE
* connect_entities function: failed to connect {'Pipe'} from offshore-pump at x=107.5 y=-33.5 to boiler at x=111.5 y=-32.0.
* Important variables:
	+ transport_belt: 8
	+ small_electric_pole: 1
	+ pipe: 20
	+ stone_furnace: 1
	+ wood: 7
	+ iron_ore: 6
	+ copper_ore: 20
	+ iron_plate: 613
	+ copper_plate: 5
	+ copper_cable: 2
	+ iron_gear_wheel: 2
